• ONLINEElicitation of 100 basic lexical items presented in alphabetical order. Referred to as "Hoijer's wordlist.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.001
• ONLINEElicitation of various basic vocabulary items. Referred to as a "diagnostic list.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.002

• ONLINEElicitation of nature words and phrases. Includes river, foam, thunder, and "It is cold today.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.003
• ONLINEElicitation of words pertinent to animals. Includes quadriped, bear, deer, etc.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.004
• ONLINEMiscellaneous lexical items such as automobile, table, and spoon. Includes many loanwords.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.005
• ONLINEWordlist of domesticated animals like sheep, goat, and various fowl. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.006
• ONLINEElicitation of miscellaneous lexical items, but especially days of the week. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.007
• ONLINEElicitation of words and phrases with the intent to capture vowel system. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.008
• ONLINENumbering system for round items. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.009
• ONLINENumbering system for long items like pencils, snakes, etc.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.010
• ONLINENumbering system for the number of times an action was executed. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.011
• ONLINENumbering system for each type of fruit. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.012
• ONLINENumbering system for counting people. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.013
• ONLINENumbering system for flat things like pages, leaves, etc.. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.014
• ONLINENumbering system for machetes, bread, and money. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.015
• ONLINENumbering system for cloth. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.016
• ONLINENumbering system for items in row. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.017
• ONLINENumbering system for days. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.018
• ONLINENumbering system for branches of trees. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.019
• ONLINENumbering system for fathoms. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.020
• ONLINEElicitation of phrases with direct object pronouns. Includes such phrases as "I hit you.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.021

• ONLINEElicitation of phrases with indirect object pronouns. Includes such phrases as "I gave it to you.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.022

• ONLINEElicitation of words and phrases regarding spatial relationships. Includes prepositions like in, on, and over, and phrases like "The pencil is on the table.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.023

• ONLINEElicitation of phrases using conjunctions. Includes phrases like "Elario and I are going fishing.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.024

• ONLINEElicitation of phrases like "That woman is very old." Referred to as "equational sentences.". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.025
• ONLINEElicitation of questions such as "How does he do it?" and "How deep is the water?". Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.026

• ONLINEElicitation of various verb paradigms including to speek, to feed, to take, to cook, and to beat. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.027
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to be born, to step on, to weave, to show, and to hear. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.028
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to tempt, to win, to hang, to steal, to cut. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.029
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to drive, to blow, to hold, to pour, and to fling. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.030
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to pass away, to forget, to search, to find, and to kill. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.031
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to sweep, to hit, to dig, to bind, and to make. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.032
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to sing, to catch, to eat, to cry, and to fly. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.033
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to jump, to spread, to stick, to run, and to butcher. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.034
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to tear, to lose, to begin, to swell, and to send. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.035
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to climb, to grow, to do, to go, and to sow. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.036
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to pass, to ask, to keep, to live, and to get up. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.037

• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to wake up, to leave, to leave, to leave behind, and to rot. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.038
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to drink, to say, to swear, to fall, and to wring. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.039

• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to shout, to eat, to exchange, to work, and to make smooth. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.040

• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to cut, to look, to strike, to learn anything quickly, and to write. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.041
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to fight, to break, to flee, to teach, and to think. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.042
• ONLINEElicitation of verb paradigms for to grind, to hide, to lure, to have, and to be. Baker, Donald (researcher). [1971-08]. California Language Archive. oai:cla.berkeley.edu:LA 54.043
